game.name: Phantom the Huntress
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Not sword-clanging trash. Not glitter-magic garbage. Bow only. The rest is for peasants. I’m Phantom, elite huntress, eternally exhausted. You’ll track, gather, goblin-slay, babysit dumb NPCs and rank up at snail pace. Wishlist now. I get bonus wine money. Do it or vanish. My patience is dead.
